translation.biography-5: interested in anything Open Source & Cutting Edge Frontend technologies

cv.mpunkt-1: Project lead & continued development after takeover of a customer-tailored web application
cv.mpunkt-2: Leading a SCRUM-like team of up to five developers
cv.mpunkt-3: Using Code Review- and Pair Programming-like processes
cv.mpunkt-4: Client contact concerning SDLC via mail, phone as well as on site
cv.mpunkt-5: Modernizing the development processes with tools such as IDE plugins, npm, composer, Sentry, SCSS, React, TypeScript, webpack and Jenkins
cv.mpunkt-6: Supervising and coordinating work students and trainees
cv.self-study-title: Self study: Web Development & Software Engineering
cv.self-study-1: Moderator of the official reddit.com/r/webdev Discord channel with several thousand learning developers
cv.self-study-2: Built and maintained several versions of World of Warcraft-related tools (Advanced Guild Statistics, Advanced Armory Access, Artifact Power Rating)
cv.self-study-3: Built and maintained several versions of Resources Helper, a data-driven calculation-heavy spreadsheet on steroids for a mobile game
cv.self-study-4: During my training as media designer, developed and maintained several versions of a company internal PDF generator for time tracking
cv.self-study-5: Built a neutral and transparent election orientation help for the German election of 2017
cv.uni-trier-1: Member of the Philosophy student council Summer 2013 - Summer 2014
cv.uni-trier-2: Website management of the Philosophy student council
cv.uni-trier-3: Poster design for Philosophy student council events
